title: Need help identifying two fonts
content:
I used these fonts a while back for some banners and need to add to the place I used them on...I can't remember what they're called, though. So any help is greatly appreciated!

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled\_puppet/toc-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054751/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled_puppet/toc-2.png "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled\_puppet/toc-2.png")

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled\_puppet/kilian\_about.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054751/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled_puppet/kilian_about.png "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v204/tangled\_puppet/kilian\_about.png")

Font: 

 Clouds and Blue & Dear Joe 4 

Solved By: 

 [osamu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054751/http:/typophile.com/user/215937 "View user profile.")
author: craftyloser

comments.content:
Your first is [Clouds and Blue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054751/http:/www.dafont.com/cloudsandblue.font)

Your second is [Dear Joe 4 Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054751/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/dear-joe-4/regular/) from JOEBOB Graphics.
